description:
A member of "Cabinet Department 6," an intelligence bureau under the direct jurisdiction of the Earth Federations government, and a commanding officer of the Earth Federation special forces "Mastima." He is ranked a first lieutenant. He has been ordered to confirm the existence of research materials related to the Psycho Frame in a research facility located inside Axis and to recover those materials if present. He requests Arlette and Danton to accompany him as guides to Axis and acts as their guard.
Source: gundam.info
name: Mehmet Merka
